participant_1.background:
I can't stand pizza, but my mom loves it.
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i really enjoy making friends.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.

participant_2.background:
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
I collect cosplay props to bring my favorite characters to life.
My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

content.text: Hey there! What is your favorite way to spend the weekend?
I love to collect cosplay props and bring my favorite characters to life.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
Oh nice! Do you have any pets that help you keep the place in order?
Yes! I have a dog named Lucky. He's a great companion and loves to play fetch with me.
That's awesome! I love dogs. I have two cats, but they are both very independent.
Yes! I have two kids, a boy and a girl. They are both a handful, but I wouldn't trade them for the world.
That's great! I don't have any kids yet, but I'm looking forward to starting a family someday.
Well, I'm sure you'll be a great parent! You seem like a really nice person.
Thanks! I appreciate that! I'm sure you're a great parent too.
Thank you! I try my best
